description: These foiled grilled prawns are perfectly cooked and juicy every time.
name: Foil Grilled Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g prawns, raw, peeled, deveined, tails on
2 lemons, juice of 1, 1 chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, parsley, garlic and chilli flakes to a bowl, tip in the prawns, toss to coat and set aside to marinate for 10 minutes.
Pre-heat the grill to high. Take a large sheet of foil and fold up the edges to make a pouch. Tip in the prawns, drizzle with lemon juice and seal the top to make a parcel.
Cook on the grill for 8-10 minutes and serve with lemon wedges.
